com.google.android.exoplayer2.audio

Class Ac3Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.audio.Ac3Util

  • public final class Ac3Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for parsing (E-)AC-3 syncframes, which are access units in (E-)AC-3 bitstreams.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Ac3Util.Ac3SyncFrameInfo
      Holds sample format information as presented by a syncframe header.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int AC3_SYNCFRAME_AUDIO_SAMPLE_COUNT
      Each syncframe has 6 blocks that provide 256 new audio samples.
      private static int AUDIO_SAMPLES_PER_AUDIO_BLOCK
      The number of new samples per (E-)AC-3 audio block.
      private static int[] BITRATE_BY_HALF_FRMSIZECOD
      Nominal bitrates in kbps, indexed by frmsizecod / 2.
      private static int[] BLOCKS_PER_SYNCFRAME_BY_NUMBLKSCOD
      Number of audio blocks per E-AC-3 syncframe, indexed by numblkscod.
      private static int[] CHANNEL_COUNT_BY_ACMOD
      Channel counts, indexed by acmod.
      private static int[] SAMPLE_RATE_BY_FSCOD
      Sample rates, indexed by fscod.
      private static int[] SAMPLE_RATE_BY_FSCOD2
      Sample rates, indexed by fscod2 (E-AC-3).
      private static int[] SYNCFRAME_SIZE_WORDS_BY_HALF_FRMSIZECOD_44_1
      16-bit words per syncframe, indexed by frmsizecod / 2.

      • AUDIO_SAMPLES_PER_AUDIO_BLOCK

        The number of new samples per (E-)AC-3 audio block.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AC3_SYNCFRAME_AUDIO_SAMPLE_COUNT

        private static final int AC3_SYNCFRAME_AUDIO_SAMPLE_COUNT
        Each syncframe has 6 blocks that provide 256 new audio samples. See ETSI TS 102 366 4.1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLOCKS_PER_SYNCFRAME_BY_NUMBLKSCOD

        private static final int[] BLOCKS_PER_SYNCFRAME_BY_NUMBLKSCOD
        Number of audio blocks per E-AC-3 syncframe, indexed by numblkscod.

      • SAMPLE_RATE_BY_FSCOD

        private static final int[] SAMPLE_RATE_BY_FSCOD
        Sample rates, indexed by fscod.

      • SAMPLE_RATE_BY_FSCOD2

        private static final int[] SAMPLE_RATE_BY_FSCOD2
        Sample rates, indexed by fscod2 (E-AC-3).

      • CHANNEL_COUNT_BY_ACMOD

        private static final int[] CHANNEL_COUNT_BY_ACMOD
        Channel counts, indexed by acmod.

      • BITRATE_BY_HALF_FRMSIZECOD

        private static final int[] BITRATE_BY_HALF_FRMSIZECOD
        Nominal bitrates in kbps, indexed by frmsizecod / 2. (See ETSI TS 102 366 table 4.13.)

      • SYNCFRAME_SIZE_WORDS_BY_HALF_FRMSIZECOD_44_1

        private static final int[] SYNCFRAME_SIZE_WORDS_BY_HALF_FRMSIZECOD_44_1
        16-bit words per syncframe, indexed by frmsizecod / 2. (See ETSI TS 102 366 table 4.13.)

    • Method Detail

      • parseAc3AnnexFFormat

        public static Format parseAc3AnnexFFormat(ParsableByteArray data,
                                          java.lang.String trackId,
                                          java.lang.String language,
                                          DrmInitData drmInitData)
        Returns the AC-3 format given data containing the AC3SpecificBox according to ETSI TS 102 366 Annex F. The reading position of data will be modified.
        Parameters:
        data - The AC3SpecificBox to parse.
        trackId - The track identifier to set on the format, or null.
        language - The language to set on the format.
        drmInitData - DrmInitData to be included in the format.
        Returns:
        The AC-3 format parsed from data in the header.

      • parseEAc3AnnexFFormat

        public static Format parseEAc3AnnexFFormat(ParsableByteArray data,
                                           java.lang.String trackId,
                                           java.lang.String language,
                                           DrmInitData drmInitData)
        Returns the E-AC-3 format given data containing the EC3SpecificBox according to ETSI TS 102 366 Annex F. The reading position of data will be modified.
        Parameters:
        data - The EC3SpecificBox to parse.
        trackId - The track identifier to set on the format, or null.
        language - The language to set on the format.
        drmInitData - DrmInitData to be included in the format.
        Returns:
        The E-AC-3 format parsed from data in the header.

      • parseAc3SyncframeInfo

        public static Ac3Util.Ac3SyncFrameInfo parseAc3SyncframeInfo(ParsableBitArray data)
        Returns (E-)AC-3 format information given data containing a syncframe. The reading position of data will be modified.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to parse, positioned at the start of the syncframe.
        Returns:
        The (E-)AC-3 format data parsed from the header.

      • parseAc3SyncframeSize

        public static int parseAc3SyncframeSize(byte[] data)
        Returns the size in bytes of the given AC-3 syncframe.
        Parameters:
        data - The syncframe to parse.
        Returns:
        The syncframe size in bytes. C.LENGTH_UNSET if the input is invalid.

      • getAc3SyncframeAudioSampleCount

        public static int getAc3SyncframeAudioSampleCount()
        Returns the number of audio samples in an AC-3 syncframe.

      • parseEAc3SyncframeAudioSampleCount

        public static int parseEAc3SyncframeAudioSampleCount(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Reads the number of audio samples represented by the given E-AC-3 syncframe. The buffer's position is not modified.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The ByteBuffer from which to read the syncframe.
        Returns:
        The number of audio samples represented by the syncframe.

      • getAc3SyncframeSize

        private static int getAc3SyncframeSize(int fscod,
                                       int frmsizecod)
